alert.note: Alert for Eastern Bergen; Hudson (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 1:15PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Hudson, eastern Bergen, New York (Manhattan), Bronx, southern Westchester, and southern Fairfield counties through 200 PM... At 113 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms scattered along a line extending from Oradell to Fort Lee to Jersey City. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Bergenfield, Englewood, Oradell and Norwood around 120 PM EDT. Dobbs Ferry and Riverdale around 125 PM EDT. Yonkers and Bronxville around 130 PM EDT. Mott Haven and Tarrytown around 135 PM EDT. East Tremont, Scarsdale and Hawthorne around 140 PM EDT. White Plains, Port Chester, Co-op City, Harrison and City Island around 145 PM EDT. New Rochelle and Bedford around 155 PM EDT. Stamford, Rye and Greenwich around 200 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Fordham, Closter, Larchmont, Fairview, Haworth, Mount Vernon, Thornwood, Weehawken, Tuckahoe and Pelham Manor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
